short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays quick information about the current price of Synthetix in your browser's toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description
------------------

This plugin displays the current Synthetix (SNX) price in USD ($) from coinlib.io simply in your browser's toolbar so you can see it immediately.

Functions
----------------

- currency: USD
- price check every minute
- badge color according to the current (last 24h) exchange rate (red = down, green = up)
- popup window with statistics after clicking on the toolbar icon

History
-------------

v 1.0.1 (09.01.2021)

- blinking badge when extension rate changed
- click event on icon removed and replaced with data popup 
- detailed statistics in toolbar context menu

v 1.0.0 (07.01.2021)

- price check every minute
- badge color according to the current exchange rate
- clicking on the icon redirects to statistics
- currency: USD
